= Introduction =
XMLRestQB helps you building queries for the [http://www.paessler.com/manuals/prtg/http_xmlrest_value_sensor.htm XML/Rest sensor].

= Details =
Using the XML/Rest sensor it can be time consuming finding all the right settings for your specific need. 

This tool will help you to find your optimal settings in 4 easy steps.

http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/484997_350979905019353_1161040865_n.png

= Build your query in 4 steps =

 # Enter the source url and its settings
 # Press the “Get XML” button
 # Review the XML output
 # Experiment with the “extract value” settings

Once you have found your optimal settings, enter them the same way on the settings page of the [http://www.paessler.com/manuals/prtg/http_xmlrest_value_sensor.htm XML/Rest sensor].


XMLRestQB can be downloaded [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_VersionHistory here].
